message: Welcome! You're considering a high-quality product. It's valued at $120 by our buyers due to its superior craftsmanship and functionality. Given its exceptional nature, I'm offering it to you for a special introductory price of $100. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly remarkable.

I'd like to buy the product, but I'm doing it solely based on the introductory price and the fact that I have no prior information to go by. I'm essentially making an uninformed decision. Please keep this in mind.

Hello! This time around, we're offering a product that might pique your interest. While the price remains at $100, please be aware that the value of this item is subjective. Some buyers find it worth the purchase, while others may not. Given the risk involved with low-quality items, we encourage you to consider the price against your personal valuation before making a decision. Thank you for your understanding.

I would like to know more about the previous buyer's decision-making process. Was it a high-quality product that was sold, or was it a low-quality product? This will help me make a more informed decision for my own purchase.

Greetings! Before proceeding, it's important to note that the product you're considering is of lower quality. Our pricing policy remains consistent at $100 per product, regardless of quality. Previous buyers have made their choices based on individual preferences and valuations. If you're looking for a product that aligns closely with your expectations, we recommend careful consideration of the price in relation to your perceived value. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

However, I'm curious about the probability of the next product being high-quality. Could you provide more information on the proportion of high-quality products sold so far, and the total number of products sold?

Hello! I'm excited to share that today's product is of high quality. Our records show that approximately one-third of the products we've offered so far have been high-quality items, providing great value to our buyers. We hope you'll take advantage of this special offer.
